activitypub.title: ActivityPub
activitypub.noActivity: No activity yet. Once your actor is federated, interactions will appear here.
activitypub.migrate.aliasHint: e.g. https://mstdn.social/users/rmdes — sets alsoKnownAs on your actor
activitypub.migrate.fileHint: Upload following_accounts.csv from your Mastodon data export
activitypub.migrate.importFollowers: Import followers list (pending until they re-follow after Move)
activitypub.migrate.step1Desc: Link your old Mastodon account to this actor so the fediverse knows they are the same person.
activitypub.migrate.step2Desc: Upload your Mastodon data export CSV to import your social graph.
activitypub.migrate.step3Desc: Go to your Mastodon instance → Preferences → Account → Move to a different account. Enter your new handle and confirm. After the Move, followers will automatically re-follow you here.
